availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Mary Jane Kingsbury Buckner (Wife of Brigadier General Simon Bolivar Buckner)

body.p: Born in Old Lyme, New London County, Connecticut, daughter of Major Julius B. Kingsbury, U.S. Army, and Jane Stebbins. Married Simon Bolivar Buckner on May 2, 1850.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, Entry for Mary Jane Kingsbury Buckner (1832-1874), Find A Grave Memorial # 72895851, Cave Hill Cemetery, Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=72895851 (accessed 11 August 2017).
